entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.Reverse<T>(T[]) #107723
  • Make all compiled strings default utf8 #107720
  • Build warning generating CORE_ROOT: Unable to load ILLink.RoslynAnalyzer #107719
  • [.NET 9.0 RC1] Inline Array's cannot be deserialized by System.Text.Json #107715
  • `ref readonly` parameters of a generic type may get corrupted #107710
    9.0.0
  • Tensor.ReverseDimension on sliced TensorSpan sometimes produces invalid results #107707
  • [API Proposal]: LINQ terminator .WhenAll() wrapping Task.WhenAll #107706
  • Unactionable trim warnings when using DataSet and IXmlSerializable #107704
    10.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json leaves unobserved task exceptions in background tasks when using reloadOnChange:true #107700
  • [NativeAOT] possible deadlock due to InitializeRuntime reentrancy if ModuleInitializer launches threads. #107699
  • can not attach to debugger, signature validation issues. #107684
    10.0.0
  • dotnet test may silently skip tests if .nuget folder is missing #107677
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServiceLifetimeTests.ExceptionOnStartIsPropagated #107671
    9.0.0

Closed

  • JSON Serialization on records with a Primary Constructor with Properties created from the constructor parameter definition works fine; auto-generated properties does not work unless the properties are decorated with JsonIgnore. #107703
  • [s390x] Undefined behaviour in float32 #107387
  • 👉 Comprar Diploma - Compre Agora o Seu Diploma Superior #107716
  • 👉 Compre Seu Diploma Aqui - Confira Antes Pague Depois #107717
  • 👉 Comprar Diploma Ead #107718
  • Test failure: LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.ConvertToLibraryImportFixerTests.PreserveSigFalseSignatureModified #107446
    9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: ExtendWidening ConditionalSelect tests failing #107537
    9.0.0
  • Nullref in FindImplSlotForCurrentType #105304
    10.0.0
  • HttpClient can never recover from exception in custom IHttpMessageHandlerBuilderFilter #107689
  • Should we AOT the XunitLogChecker tool? #94270
    10.0.0
  • WasmStripILAfterAOT Error #104884
  • source-built NativeAOT doesn't work with system brotli #107020
    10.0.0
  • Building runtime on Visual Studio fails with compilation errors #95564
  • Sigsegv in dotnet/msbuild when building repo #101049
  • Is possible to attach running process which single-file published, with the Visual Studio debugger? #107245
  • Analyzer 'Microsoft.Interop.Analyzers.CustomMarshallerAttributeAnalyzer' threw an exception of type 'System.InvalidProgramException #106904
  • Configuration Binder source generator generates uncompilable code for SslClientAuthenticationOptions #107003
    9.0.0
  • SHA256 hash non-deterministic or returns null reference exception in concurrence situation #107694
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add more parameters on the CreateClient from the IHttpClientFactory #107552
  • Utf8Parser.TryParse ignores the provided format for bool #100659
    9.0.0
  • [STJ] Disallow property names that conflict with metadata property names #106390
    10.0.0
  • [QUIC] Add minimal testing to MsQuic CI #101589
    Future
  • Tokens that reference generated assembly members not populated properly #107658
    9.0.0
  • UnmanagedCallersOnly_Namespaced fails on windows #107631
    10.0.0
  • Are there any benefits from using Unsafe::As in StringValues? #107688
  • hostfxr_get_runtime_property_value should set the output value to null on error #3840
    Future
  • Unable to configure host environment from a JSON settings file when using Host.CreateApplicationBuilder #97930
    Future
  • HashSet<string> breaks if copied from one that uses a non-singleton default equality comparer #107222
    10.0.0
  • Single File Application Slow on osx-x64 runtime #107674
  • Test Failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M09.5-PDC/b16335/b16335/b16335.dll #107668
  • Unable to enable server GC in dotnet 8.0.8 on linux #107649
  • Failure test:System.Net.Sockets.Tests.TcpClientTest.ConnectAsync_DnsEndPoint_Success(mode: 0) #56125
    Future
  • Consider optimizing DependencyContextJsonReader for netstandard2.0 by avoiding string allocations. #3422
  • Debugger Crashes when using breakpoints with a compiled runtime in debug mode _CrtlsValidHeapPointer(block) #103955
  • InvalidOperationException for nullable int in ConfigurationBinder source generator generated code #103859
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Backport "Fix SVE ExtendWidening ConditionalSelect tests" (#107601) #107725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Backport some PACKAGE.md files #107724
    Servicing-consider, area-Meta
  • [release/9.0] JIT ARM64-SVE: Backport "Avoid combining conditional select for reduction instrinsics" (#107207) #107722
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm: Free up upper-half register that was not ready because of its association with busy lower-half register #107714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add feature switch to disable DataSet XML serialization #107713
    area-System.Data
  • Partially revert "[GC] Avoid OOM in large-allocation-only workloads … #107712
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2536282 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cdac] break up cdacreader into 3 separate assemblies #107709
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Use system brotli on Unix non-portable builds #107708
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Bump to 8.0.10, 6.0.35 for downlevel #107702
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #107698
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move load level tracking and checks from `DomainAssembly` to `Assembly` #107697
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix test bug in FileSystem.Tests #107696
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • Work around F# ildasm/ilasm round-trip test failure #107692
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix HashSet copy constructor handling of instances that have fallen back to the randomized hashcode generator. (#107613) #107687
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Collections, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Fix HashSet copy constructor handling of instances that have fallen back to the randomized hashcode generator. (#107613) #107685
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • Improve the performance of `CollectionExtensions.InsertRange` by reducing 1 array copy #107683
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [NRBF] More bug fixes #107682
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Call fgUpdateFlowGraph in fgHeadTailMerge #107681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improved the test coverage of XmlWriter. #107680
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Remove explicit dependency on System.Buffers from System.Formats.Asn1 #107679
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [ppc64le] Fixed BinaryFormatter and Tensors tests #107678
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] [mono] Revert "don't define HAS_CUSTOM_BLOCKS on mono (#106764)" #107675
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Update to RC1 SDK #107673
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove static monitor helper functions #107667
    needs-area-label
  • Move UseSystemZlib into SetupOSSpecificProps #107666
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [s390x] Use consistent shift instruction #107559
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, arch-s390x, community-contribution
  • Remove unused freebsd elf32/elf64 header references #107657
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Fix config source gen binding with SslClientAuthenticationOptions #107705
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix config source gen binding value types to null configuration values #107670
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Disable subset of the stack overflow tests on ARM #107721
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Add the _requiresAlign8 bool to the compare and mangled name for GCStaticEETypeNode.cs #107701
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix SVE ExtendWidening ConditionalSelect tests #107601
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] ARM64-SVE: Allow op inside conditionalselect to be non HWintrinsic #107581
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Avoid taking lock for empty bucket in ConcurrentDictionary.TryRemove …" #107653
    area-System.Collections
  • Use system brotli on Unix non-portable builds #107225
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] PersistedAssemblyBuilder: fix IL reference tokens to another generated assembly members #107691
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [release/9.0] Fix SSP issue with HW exceptions from JIT helpers #107676
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Arm: Fix the base register used for restoring register from stack #107584
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] JIT: don't create vector constants from relocatable constants #107500
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] JIT ARM64: Don't emit `mov` for zero case in jump tables for shift intrinsics #107487
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Track that kmov instructions may write to GPR register #107476
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Provide System.CodeDom package readme #107372
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • Fix config source gen binding with SslClientAuthenticationOptions #107579
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 10.0.0
  • Add the _requiresAlign8 bool to the compare and mangled name for GCStaticEETypeNode.cs #107650
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clarify XML comments for Utf8Parser.TryParse to reflect case insensitivity #103861
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Consider existence of EETypes and metadata for typeof checks #107598
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Disallow types with property names conflicting with metadata. #106460
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • Remove `BaseDomain` #107652
    area-VM-coreclr
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder: fix IL reference tokens to another generated assembly members #107661
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Consolidate log for reliability framework #107517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make hostfxr_get_runtime_property_value initialize out pointer to null #107645
    area-Host
  • [mono] Fix alloca builder creation #107464
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • Fix HashSet copy constructor handling of instances that have fallen back to the randomized hashcode generator. #107613
    area-System.Collections, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Increase jiterpreter limits #107557
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix SSP issue with HW exceptions from JIT helpers #107665
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Revert "don't define HAS_CUSTOM_BLOCKS on mono (#106764)" #107558
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the clr build error on Alpine. #107669
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix config source gen binding value types to null configuration values #107654
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 10.0.0
  • Remove vestigial ReadOnlySequence.SequenceType.Empty #107630
    area-System.Memory
  • Remove helper method frame from Profiler hooks #107152
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-VM-coreclr
  • [NRBF] Fuzzing non-seekable stream input #107605
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf

Updated

  • GC cleanup #105517
    area-GC-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove redundant !fgIsCommaThrow(morphedTree) assert #107624
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DiagnosticSource] Add version event to EventSources used for out-of-proc monitoring #107576
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Overhaul Main Workflow Docs #107415
    documentation, 10.0.0
  • Remove ILCompiler package reference #107583
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [ILStrip] Fix passing assemblies using relative path #107548
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • Add test coverage for DirectoryServices.TransformControls #107201
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow SVE ops to re-use the same registers #107084
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [release/9.0] [mono] Fix swizzle_mask type #107602
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Improve PipeReader.AdvanceTo(consumed) when bytes have been examined already #107360
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Fixes hang in WinUI apps published to AOT #104583
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WASI] System.Net.NameResolution #107351
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Remove JitGenericHandleCache #106843
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    arch-arm32, arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable NuGet Audit and fix issues #107639
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT/Apple] Emit prologs/epilogs compatible with compact unwinding #107617
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] [mono] Fix crash in emit_llvmonly_handler_start #107590
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Introducing new event for failed http requests #106284 #106964
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Add JsonPascalCaseNamingPolicy #100017
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • add new JsonIgnoreAttribute WhenWriting/WhenReading #104562
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono] Set unwind table kind #107462
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • Remove some implicit Helper Method Frames (HMF) #107648
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Unify linking file composition for wasi and wasm. #107547
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable the log profiler #107434
    arch-wasm, community-contribution, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Split the HostApplicationBuilder configuration. #107616
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Include .NET version in templates package id #107628
    Servicing-consider, area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Allow to build browser in library mode #106388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, linkable-framework, os-browser
  • [release/9.0] Fix JsonSchemaExporter support for global UnmappedMemberHandling settings. #107604
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [no merge][interp] align check atomic ops on wasm #106963
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [NRBF] Arrays of any records #107627
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • [release/9.0][browser] Enable the log profiler #107626
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][mini] Prefer calling llvmaot compiled method instead of inlining it with JIT #107401
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/9.0] BinaryFormatter tests improvements #107540
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Expand "return condition" into "return condition ? true : false" #107499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Move performance testing logic into python scripts #101143
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [Tar] Fill in the file size even if the file is empty. #107633
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Formats.Tar, 9.0.0
